mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS rootCatId, c.NAME AS rootCatName, c.slogan AS slogan, c.cat_image AS catImage, c.bg_color AS bgColor, i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, ii.url AS itemUrl FROM category AS c LEFT JOIN items AS i ON c.id = i.root_cat_id LEFT JOIN items_img AS ii ON i.id = ii.item_id WHERE c.id = #{fatherId} AND ii.is_main = 1 ORDER BY i.created_time DESC LIMIT 0, 6

select i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, ii.item_id as itemId, tempSpec.priceDiscounts as price from items as i LEFT JOIN items_img as ii on i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (select item_id ,min(price_discount) as priceDiscounts from items_spec group by item_id) as tempSpec on tempSpec.item_id = ii.item_id where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramMap.keyword}%'
order by price asc order by sellCounts desc order by itemName asc

select i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, ii.item_id as itemId, tempSpec.priceDiscounts as price from items as i LEFT JOIN items_img as ii on i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (select item_id ,min(price_discount) as priceDiscounts from items_spec group by item_id) as tempSpec on tempSpec.item_id = ii.item_id where ii.is_main = 1 and i.cat_id = #{paramMap.catId}
order by price asc order by sellCounts desc order by itemName asc

SELECT i.id AS itemId, ii.url as itemImgUrl, i.item_name AS itemName, spec.price_discount AS priceDiscount, spec.price_normal AS priceNormal, spec.id AS specId, spec.`name` AS specName FROM items_spec AS spec LEFT JOIN items_img AS ii ON spec.item_id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN items AS i ON i.id = spec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 and spec.id in
#{specId}
